templates.footer: <style>hr {border-top: 2px #1a6ecc solid;margin-bottom: 8em;} .toc-h1, h1.page-title {display: none}; #toc .list-group .list-group-item:first-of-type {display: none;}body {font-size: 18px;} .sunlight-javascript, .sunlight-bash, .sunlight-plaintext {font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5em;} .sunlight-highlight-text.sunlight-highlighted, .sunlight-highlight-bash.sunlight-highlighted, .sunlight-highlight-javascript.sunlight-highlighted {background:#FFEFB9;border: 1px #FFDE6A solid;} .sunlight-menu{display:none;} footer {margin-bottom: 3em;border-top: 0} footer span, footer span a, footer span a:hover {color:#cccccc !important}</style>
